name: てるもこ鳥船 ～ Fiery Flight in Moonlit Garden
name_original: てるもこ鳥船 ～ Fiery Flight in Moonlit Garden
description:
Imagine waking up in a beautiful rainforest, among lianas and dazzling butterflies, loсated 380,000 km away from the Earth. But this realm does not belong to humans. And now you have to work together with your cute, deadly and immortal archrival to reach to the Earth and return to Gensoukyou. Can you two make a great combo?

てるもこ鳥船 ～ Fiery Flight in Moonlit Garden is a short game made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 6

Gameplay

It's a story driven platformer where the player should swap between two characters to achieve their destination.

Controls:

P - swap characters
J - attack/action
Space - Jump

This is a fan work based on Touhou Project by Team Shanghai Alice, specially for Touhou Game Jam 6.

All elements of Touhou Project, including characters, setting, and concept, are property of ZUN and Team Shanghai Alice.

Made using Corgi Engine by More Mountains.
